snippet.title: The Bard's Tale Trilogy launch trailer
snippet.description:
Rescue a city trapped by a wizard, reforge the legendary Destiny Wand, and travel across time and space to confront a Mad God! 

Featuring updated graphics and optional quality of life gameplay features, The Bard’s Tale Trilogy is the ideal way to experience the dungeon crawling challenge that made the original games beloved classics. The title releases on August 14, 2018 for PC on both Steam and GOG.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/843260/The_Bards_Tale_Trilogy/
https://www.gog.com/game/the_bards_tale_trilogy

ESRB RATING PENDING:  May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit esrb.org for rating info.
